channel.title: Death
channel.description:
[code] [3/16/12 7:02 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [3/16/12 7:02 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.applyDead(Player Assistant.java:1161) [3/16/12 7:02 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1908)
[3/16/12 7:02 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:142) [/code] i get this error whenever someone dies, does anyone know how to fix it @_@?

item.title: Death
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

They don’t lose there items.

item.title: Death
item.dc:creator: @Ploxxies Ploxxies
item.description:
@Ploxxies wrote:

Does anything bad happen whenever someone dies? Examples would be the game freezing, or player glitches up when doing the death emote? If not, it shouldn’t really matter if it says that.

Read full topic
